ygData.subject: Beginning research....
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, pretty simple. I want to know how to do it. I ve reached 19th lvl and have basically ignored the research aspect of our class, because: 1. I ve managed
ygData.messageBody:
Well, pretty simple. I want to know how to do it. I've reached 19th lvl and
have basically ignored the research aspect of our class, because:

1. I've managed to get 1 rune, and I didn't find it, I was given it as a
friend. People say they are random, but after sitting in Oasis for 3 levels
and killing every single dw croc, dw caiman, crocodiles, caimans and Lockjaw
(twice), I have as yet to find even 1 rune. These things THAT rare? I have
also never seen a vendor selling them.

2. I've looked all over Queynos for the doctrine of Wizardry and never found
it. I have to take a trip to Erudin? That would be ridiculous.

3. I couldn't train in research past 1 pt. when I hit 16th, haven't trained
since then. Does this mean we have to spend numerous pieces of plat to
improve this skill?

Could some kind soul please give me a walkthrough on how you've researched
spells? Where and how you get runes?

Zalbar
19th Wizard
Solusek Ro
